settings.name: au_max_imposters
settings.help: The maximum number of imposters. The actual number of imposters per game is calculated using the formula (num_players - 1) / 6 + 1.

settings.name: au_min_players
settings.help: The minimum number of players necessary for a game to begin.

settings.name: au_kill_cooldown
settings.help: How long imposters must wait between kills, in seconds.

settings.name: au_killdistance_mod
settings.help: Multiplier for imposters' kill range. Can have decimals.

settings.name: au_confirm_ejects
settings.help: Should an ejected player's role be revealed?

settings.name: au_dead_chat
settings.help: Should dead players be able to talk to one another?

settings.name: au_game_chat
settings.help: Should players be able to talk during the game?

settings.name: au_time_limit
settings.help: How long until crewmates win by default, in seconds. Set to 0 to disable entirely.

settings.name: au_countdown
settings.help: How long the pre-round countdown lasts, in seconds.

settings.name: au_warmup_force_auto
settings.help: Should autopoilot be enabled even if admins are online?

settings.name: au_warmup_time
settings.help: How long to wait before starting a new round, in seconds.

settings.name: au_meeting_cooldown
settings.help: How long players must wait before calling a meeting.

settings.name: au_meeting_available
settings.help: How many meetings a player can call.

settings.name: au_meeting_vote_time
settings.help: How long players have to vote during a meeting, in seconds.

settings.name: au_meeting_vote_pre_time
settings.help: How long players have to discuss events before voting, in seconds.

settings.name: au_meeting_vote_post_time
settings.help: How long after all votes are cast should players have to discuss?

settings.name: au_tasks_short
settings.help: How many short tasks to give each player.

settings.name: au_tasks_long
settings.help: How many long tasks to give each player.

settings.name: au_tasks_common
settings.help: How many common tasks to give to all players.

settings.name: au_tasks_enable_visual
settings.help: Should tasks produce visual effects?

settings.name: au_debug_bot_tasks
settings.help: Should bots be assigned tasks?

settings.name: au_debug_bot_vote
settings.help: Should bots cast votes in meetings?
